name: Tiny Planet (Grimmr)
description:
You have crash landed on a small exoplanet far from home. If you ever want to get back you're going to have to find the parts you need to repair your ship

If you have trouble getting up a ladder try jumping near the top. For some reason the fading goes a little bit crazy in the html version as sadly I couldn't fix that in time. This is known to not be an issue in the windows download.

Controls:
Move Left -> A/Left
Move Right -> D/Right
Climb -> W/UP
Jump -> Space
Interact -> Enter

Source: https://github.com/TinyPlanetStudios/Project-Crash-Land
